assessment_item.title: 7QNHTRQ20 காமா கதிர்கள் ________ கதிர் வீச்சு ஆகும்?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

காமா கதிர்கள் ________ கதிர் வீச்சு ஆகும்?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

அயனியாக்கும்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1708"},{"text":"

அயனியாக்காத

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1718"},{"text":"

அயனியாக்கும் மற்றும் அயனியாக்காத

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1723"},{"text":"

இவற்றில் எதுவுமில்லை

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1728"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"7QNHTRQ20 காமா கதிர்கள் ________ கதிர் வீச்சு ஆகும்?","title":"7QNHTRQ20 காமா கதிர்கள் ________ கதிர் வீச்சு ஆகும்?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Microbiology","qlevel":"MEDIUM","contentType":"Resource","mimeType":"application/vnd.ekstep.ecml-archive","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
